document_data.mainbody:
'''A Fool's Errand''' is a companion adventure for the ''[[Idle Champions of the Forgotten Realms]]'' that takes place in the [[Sword Coast]] region during the [[Festival of Fools]] celebration. The adventure is designed for a party of 8{{th}} to 10{{th}} levels.{{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20211014205730/http://www.codenameentertainment.com/images/website/dnd/Adventures/AFoolsErrand.pdf| title =  Codename Entertainment - A Fool's Errand| accessdate = 14-10-2021| date = 14-10-2021}}

{{quote|''In the mountain village of [[Hornfirth]], it’s time to look forward to enjoying a night of mirth and celebration at the Festival of Fools. But when a local frost giant becomes enraged at a practical joke gone bad, it’s up to the characters to set things right.''}}
